contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox AFL player | name = Xavier Tanner | birth_date = 2 May 1956 | birth_place = | originalteam = [[Wodonga Football Club|Wodonga]] | heightweight = 183 cm / 78 kg | death_date = | death_place = | debutdate = 1976 | debutteam = [[North Melbourne Football Club|North Melbourne]] | debutopponent = | debutstadium = | playingteams = [[North Melbourne Football Club|North Melbourne]] (1976–83) * 100 games, 68 goals [[Melbourne Football Club|Melbourne]] (1984–85) * 11 games, 5 goals '''Total''' – 111 games, 73 goals | statsend = 1985 | careerhighlights = }} '''Xavier Tanner''' (born 2 May 1956) is a former [[Australian rules]] footballer who played with [[North Melbourne Football Club|North Melbourne]] and [[Melbourne Football Club|Melbourne]] in the [[Australian Football League|Victorian Football League]] (VFL).<ref>Fullpointsfooty profile http://www.fullpointsfooty.net/t-u-v.htm#Xavier%20Tanner%20(North%20Melbourne%20&%20Melbourne)</ref> A centreman, Tanner was recruited to the VFL from Wodonga in the [[Ovens & Murray Football League]]. He played in North Melbourne's 1977 premiership side and their losing grand final the following season. After managing exactly 100 games he joined his old coach [[Ron Barassi]] at Melbourne in 1984 and spent the last two seasons of his career with them.<ref>{{AflRleague|ref=X/Xavier_Tanner.html}}</ref> Tanner is currently the Assistant Principal at Wanganui Park Secondary College in Shepparton, Victoria. Tanner's father [[Gerald Tanner]] played one game for [[Richmond Football Club|Richmond]] in [[1941 VFL season|1941]].<ref>Hillier, K. (2004) ''Like Father Like Son'', Pennon Publishing, Melbourne. ISBN 1-877029-73-4.</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} {{1977 North Melbourne Kangaroos premiership players}} {{Use dmy dates|date=September 2010}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Tanner, Xavier | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Australian rules footballer | DATE OF BIRTH =2 May 1956 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Tanner, Xavier}} [[Category:1956 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Melbourne Football Club players]] [[Category:North Melbourne Football Club players]] [[Category:Wodonga Football Club players]] [[Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia)]]
